page.title: 05MANOR FARM
page.content: There has been a farm on this site for longer than anyone can remember. Originally it was a mixed farm of 160 acres but 40 acres was sold in 1967 to build the school and housing estate. Recently it has specialised in intensive pig farming with up to 1200 pigs. When Farmer Moore wanted to increase the number of pigs there was insufficient space near the house without causing offence to the nearby residents. Therefore the outlying land has been sold to other farmers and the land around the farmhouse and the adjoining vicarage grounds has been sold to Tarmac Homes for private housing development. There has been a great deal of local opposition to the sale of land, particularly from residents whose houses will overlook the new development.
